name: Supybot-plugin-seloger
body: supybot-plugin-seloger ====================== supybot plugin for seloger ### Description ### This supybot plugin searches and alerts you in query for any new adds one the french website "seloger.com". It's quite dirty but it works ;). ### License ### See the plugin files. ### Screenshot ### ### Dependancies ### This plugin relies on: * supybot (...) * lxml * sqlite3 * python2 ### Commands ### * ```sladd ```: add a new search for you * ```sllist```: list your active searches * ```sldisable ```: disable the given search The bot replies and send new adds in query.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
